name: Beef Pot Pie
ingredientsWAmounts: 2 pie crusts dough, you can use a homemade recipe such as mine or for a quick dinner I use Pillsbury

1½ cup diced potatoes cut into bite size pieces
2 cups beef broth, use the remaining beef broth from cooking the stew meat and additional beef broth if necessary to get 2 cups

ingredients: skinless and boneless chicken breast fillet
